resources.string:
FlagQuiz android application created with four levels to gain Knowledge about many countries and to have some gaming xp. lets see about it can enjoy 

 Guess The Country- GAME 1 


 Clicking on the Guess the Country button,it display random flag pick from the 256 countries. there is also dropdown list with ALL the names of the 256 countries The user select country name from dropdown list and click submit button it will check answer and show whether answer is correct or wrong




Guess Hints- GAME 2 


 Clicking on the Guess-Hints button, t display random flag pick from the 256 countries. there is also some dashes equals to country name characters The user will be using the textbox to type a single character which is part of the country’s name in an attempt to guess the flag’s country character by character and submit his guesses using the “Submit” button.if there Any correct guesses of characters will be replacing the corresponding dashes with the actual character .




Guess the Flag- GAME 3 



Clicking on the Guess the flag button,it display name of the random flag from 256 countries and also gave some randowm three country flag with correct flag to select correct one from that three flags when click flag it gives answer is correct or wrong




Advanced Level- GAME 4 



Clicking on the Advanced-level button,this give some advanced xp to user to guess three names of given random flag and submit there answer. user got three submit terms to check answers




Time Based



 if user switch on the timer every game play based on timer timer normal limit was 10 seconds.



 All Right Recived,By Mewan Madusha.
